Class UpdateArticleDto

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.DTOs.Article
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Data Transfer Object for updating an existing article. Only user-modifiable fields are included (metadata, tags, and user state).

public class UpdateArticleDto
Inheritance
object

object.ToString()

Remarks

This DTO is used when users manually edit article metadata or when updating user interaction states (read status, starred, favorite).

All properties are optional to support partial updates. Only provided properties will be updated.

Tag names to add to the existing tags.
